lead_paragraph: Seven weeks before he died, Father Thaer Abdal was standing beside the gnarled stone grotto to the Virgin Mary in Sayidat al-Nejat church, an extremely worried man.
snippet: The Iraqi priest feared that he and his parishioners would be in need of deliverance, and his fears proved correct.

headline.main: Premonitions of Danger at Baghdad Church Held Hostage

abstract: The Iraqi priest feared that he and his parishioners would be in need of deliverance, and his fears proved correct.
